mapper.select: SELECT A.iuser, A.email, A.nm, A.tel, A.mainProfile, A.regdt , (SELECT COUNT(ifeed) FROM t_feed WHERE iuser = ${youIuser}) AS cntFeed , (SELECT COUNT(iuserMe) FROM t_user_follow WHERE iuserMe = ${youIuser}) AS cntFollow , (SELECT COUNT(iuserYou) FROM t_user_follow WHERE iuserYou = ${youIuser}) AS cntFollower , (SELECT COUNT(iuserMe) FROM t_user_follow WHERE iuserMe = ${youIuser} AND iuserYou = ${meIuser}) AS isYouFollowMe , (SELECT COUNT(iuserMe) FROM t_user_follow WHERE iuserMe = ${meIuser} AND iuserYou = ${youIuser}) AS isMeFollowYou FROM t_user A WHERE A.iuser = ${youIuser}
